alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 10:07AM EDT until September 06 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd affecting Leon and Wakulla Counties. For the St. Marks River...including Newport On Old Magnolia Rd... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Marks River near Newport On Old Magnolia Rd. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water begins to flood yards of some residences of homes near Old Magnolia Road in Wakulla County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 0.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 8.2 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 01/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM EDT.
